question: Which Union Ministry is organising the 'Vriksharopan Abhiyan' programme?
option1: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
option4: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
explanation:
The 'Vriksharopan Abhiyan' is being organised by the Ministry of Coal. The programme involves all coal and lignite PSUs of the country to promote largescale plantation near mines, offices and other suitable residential areas.
Union Home Minister Amit Shah is set to launch the campaign along with Coal Minister Pralhad Joshi. The event will take place through video conference to inaugurate planting in as many as 130 locations across 10 coal and lignite rich states.
